message: Optional prop added. Consider documenting this prop in component documentation or JSDoc comments.
showAvatar prop controls visual content. Ensure there's alternative text or ARIA labels for users who can't see images.
suggestion: Add aria-label or alt text handling: {showAvatar && }

message: The error object is displayed directly. This could expose sensitive error details or stack traces to end users.
suggestion:
Use a user-friendly error message instead: if (error) return
Unable to load user profile. Please try again.

message: Good practice: Loading state is now properly managed before async operation.
Login credentials are being sent. Ensure this uses HTTPS and the API endpoint implements rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks.
suggestion: Consider adding client-side rate limiting or CAPTCHA after multiple failed attempts.

message: Derived state pattern used correctly. isAuthenticated is now computed from user state, eliminating redundant state management.
Return type changed from boolean to object. This is a breaking change. Ensure all call sites are updated to handle the new return type.
suggestion: Consider adding a deprecation period or version bump if this is a library function.

message: Basic email regex validation is not comprehensive. This pattern can be bypassed with various edge cases.
Improved error messaging for password validation. Good UX improvement.
Password validation only checks length. Consider enforcing stronger password requirements (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters).
